Sentencas: Ni alloys are examined as redox-resistant alternatives to pure Ni for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anodes.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the various candidate alloys, Ni-Co alloys are selected due to their thermochemical stability in the SOFC anode environment.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes are prepared by ammonia co-precipitation, and their electrochemical performance and microstructure are evaluated.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni-Co alloy anodes exhibit high durability against redox cycling, whilst the current-voltage characteristics are comparable to those of pure Ni cermet anodes.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructural observation reveals that cobalt-rich oxide layers on the outer surface of the Ni-Co alloy particles protect against further oxidation within the Ni alloy.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In long-term durability tests using highly humidified hydrogen gas, the use of a Ni-Co cermet with Gd-doped CeO2 suppresses degradation of the power generation perfor-mance.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is concluded that Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes are highly attractive for the development of robust SOFCs.
Titulo: Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
Performance and durability of Ni-Co alloy cermet anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
